intro: Geniostoma psychotrioides, commonly known as the psychotrioides geniostoma, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its small, clustered flowers and woody stems. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and have a smooth surface, while its flowers are usually white or pale yellow. It is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest undergrowth.
